author: Makayla Haverluk
review: There's no parking and the surrounding businesses don't let you park there. Management doesn't care about it. The building also has several problems, like the construction wasn't thought all the way through and rushed to get it done. Security is a sham. Front doors don't always lock so people can just walk right in.

author: AJ Guest
review: This isn't a review more so a question posed to the management. I see that y'all only have 7 reviews for this property and I wanna know why you down play the few reviews that were negative as well as disregard someones personal experiences

author: Randy Siverson
